e2e-2026-02-09-redis-overcommit.title: Redis host kernel setting warning
e2e-2026-02-09-redis-overcommit.details: Redis warns that vm.overcommit_memory should be enabled. Add host sysctl configuration for stable background save/replication behavior.

e2e-2026-02-09-postgres-locale.title: Postgres locale warning on init
e2e-2026-02-09-postgres-locale.details: Postgres init logs 'no usable system locales were found' in alpine image initialization. Verify locale requirements and image defaults.

e2e-2026-02-09-playwright-live-skip.title: Live LLM Playwright spec skipped
e2e-2026-02-09-playwright-live-skip.details: E2E run has one skipped test: templates-ai-live.spec.ts (@requires-llm). Document skip behavior or provide CI profile with live LLM.

e2e-2026-02-09-compose-file-bind.title: Windows compose file-bind compatibility risk
e2e-2026-02-09-compose-file-bind.details: Compose startup previously failed with invalid volume specification on file bind mounts. Current workaround removes file binds; add cross-platform compose validation to prevent regressions.
